.. _Computer module:

Module: computer
================
This module is used to query data about computers.

General usage:

.. code-block:: none

    ğŸ¦ > computer <submodule>

Results can be exported to a csv file using the keyword "**export**" 
at the end of the command:

.. code-block:: none

    ğŸ¦ > computer <submodule> export

A csv file will be generated in "**exports**" directory.

computer obsolete
-----------------
This submodule finds all computers with obsolete OS.

.. code-block:: none

    ğŸ¦ > computer obsolete

computer laps
-------------
This submodule finds all computers with LAPS enabled.

.. code-block:: none

    ğŸ¦ > computer laps
